products.title: Apple
products.description:
Enjoy the natural sweetness and refreshing crunch of our premium fresh apples. Perfect for a healthy snack, these apples are handpicked for their vibrant color, juicy texture, and rich flavor. Ideal for eating raw, adding to salads, baking pies, or blending into smoothies. Packed with essential vitamins, fiber, and antioxidants to keep you energized and nourished throughout the day.

✅ Weight: ~150–200 g per piece
✅ Storage: Keep refrigerated to maintain freshness
✅ Best for: Snacks, desserts, and healthy recipes

products.title: Cream Cake
products.description: Delight in the rich taste and fluffy texture of our freshly baked cake. Perfectly moist and layered with smooth, creamy frosting, every bite offers a melt-in-your-mouth experience. Ideal for birthdays, celebrations, or simply indulging your sweet tooth.

products.title: Ice cream
products.description:
Indulge in the ultimate frozen delight with our creamy, handcrafted ice cream. Made from fresh dairy and premium ingredients, each scoop offers a silky-smooth texture and rich, natural flavor that melts in your mouth. Perfect for hot days, celebrations, or a late-night treat, our ice cream comes in a variety of flavors—from classic vanilla to decadent chocolate and seasonal fruit blends.

Why you’ll love it:

Creamy and smooth with every bite

Made with real milk and fresh ingredients

Available in multiple irresistible flavors

Ideal for parties, desserts, or a personal indulgence

Treat yourself to a scoop (or two) and experience pure frozen happiness!

products.title: Bread
products.description: Enjoy the comforting aroma and taste of our freshly baked bread, crafted daily using high-quality flour and time-honored baking techniques. With a soft, fluffy interior and a golden, crisp crust, this bread is perfect for sandwiches, toast, or simply enjoyed warm with butter.
